numerical.analysis

Class PolynomialSplineFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • numerical.analysis.PolynomialFunction
      • numerical.analysis.PolynomialSplineFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function

    public class PolynomialSplineFunction
extends PolynomialFunction
    This class aims to extend the concept of a function through the Function interface to polynomial spline functions along with additional instance variables and methods. This class also uses composition by having an array of class type PolynomialFunction.
